title: Harris’s background undercuts Trump’s efforts to woo Indian American voters

title: U.S. reports highest number of covid-19 deaths in one day since mid-May

author: David A. Fahrenthold
title: Trump previously donated $6,000 to Kamala D. Harris’s campaigns

author: Ashley Parker
title: ‘Extraordinarily nasty’: Trump hurls one of his favorite insults at a new target in Kamala Harris
description: The resonance of Trump’s “nasty” adjective is often different when the recipient is a woman — and different still when that woman is a person of color.
